thread.title: AJ - Comfort Inn- Westpark Drive, Charlotte NC
thread.title_full: Hubert reviewed by AJ - Comfort Inn- Westpark Drive, Charlotte NC

author: AJ - Comfort Inn- Westpark Drive, Charlotte NC
title: AJ - Comfort Inn- Westpark Drive, Charlotte NC
text: Truly great experience working with Hubert customer service staff members. They make everything easy for you and that's wonderful feeling. I go above and beyond to help you place & return the order.
